article_title: Off Exchange Sign Ups Boost Enrollment Trends

article_metadata.description: HHS has been purposely inflating the enrollment numbers that they publish on Obamacare, which makes one of their omissions odd. They have made no estimate of the number of people signing up off the exchanges. These enrollments are giving a boost to Obamacare's sign up trends, and will represent an upside [...]
article_metadata.author: Scott Gottlieb
